snippet: An Indian Army statement said Indian soldiers returned fire from an intruder and later found a dead Pakistani soldier, whose body has been returned.
abstract: Indian troops shoot and kill another Pakistani soldier at de facto border between two countries in Kashmir, adding to unusually tense period in disputed region.
lead_paragraph: An Indian Army statement said Indian soldiers returned fire from an intruder and later found a dead Pakistani soldier, whose body has been returned.

headline.seo: Indian Troops Kill Pakistani Soldier in Kashmir Border Clash
headline.main: Indian Troops Kill Pakistani Soldier in Kashmir Border Clash
